data.title: Professor John Michael Wallace
data.text:
John M. (Mike) Wallace

Professor Emeritus, Department of Atmospheric Sciences

University of Washington

VITA PUBLICATIONS BOOKS LECTURES STUDENTS AND COLLABORATORS AUTOBIOGRAPHICAL OUTREACH

This web site contains

a listing of my peer-reviewed publications and other writings with links to the manuscripts

biographical information relating to my professional career, including a CV

links to my co-authored textbooks

samples of my lectures

names and affiliations of graduate students, postdocs and other scientists with whom I have collaborated

some photographs that may be of historical interest

some projects in India that I my wife and I are currently involved in

a few as-yet unpublished essays on current topics and on the evolution of the field of atmospheric sciences over the span of my careerâ€”not only the scientific and technological advances, but the changes in public perceptions and in our own attitudes about our work

At the time of this writing (May 2016), some of these segments of the web page are complete, some are still works in progress, and some, like the essays, are still in the planning stage.
